name: Zombie Killer:Idle Hero
description:
Create your own hero! ! Strengthen your hero through merge, upgrade, idle！

Game features:
1. Placement games without operation
Place your heroes and fight for you automatically!
Just wait and synthesize to get higher combat power and higher level equipment!
You can get a generous reward even if you are offline!

2. Rich play content
Over 1000 different levels of zombie monsters are waiting for you to challenge!
Over 1000 different styles of weapons and equipment are waiting for you to unlock!
There are three more worlds, looking forward to you to save

3. Super BOSS battle mode
The powerful BOSS strikes, only you can defeat it!

Warriors, are you ready for the challenge? !
